column6: Spacious upstairs corner bedroom & closet just minutes to trendy Bishop Arts, Trinity Groves, & downtown. Recently renovated room with west and south-facing windows in a huge house that's constantly being updated. Room includes queen-sized mattress with brand new sheets and comforter, new pillows, fresh paint, brand new carpet & flooring, lock on door, wooden blinds, natural light, internet & walk-in closet. Wi-Fi included, coffee in the kitchen.
column9: RUBY room #CrashPadDallas XL room near downtown
